review: Used to use Amazon prime through my PS3 but was a bit clunky. Bought the Fire Stick and it completed the experience. So easy to use and I synced it up to my Kindle tablet and that was a plus. If you're a Prime user, it's a must. A lot of bang for the buck.
author: Pit

review: If you have Amazon Prime, its a must-have!!!! I can't stress this enough. Portable, easy to use, fast connection to the internet(this is where it easily beats chrome), ever growing number of apps. The super responsive remote control is a huge plus. Beware however, that it is quite tiny so can be very easily lost, then you'll have to part with over $30 (come on Amazon, how can the replacement remote be more expensive than the entire unit). I also wish it could directly draw power from the HDMI connection so you don't have to plug it to a electric source. All in all, great buy! You wont be disappointed
author: Denis Odokonyero

review: This is awesome for binge watching!I wish Amazon would add Audible to the list of Apps.I strongly recommend Caller-ID (Fire TV Edition) by guidology. It is cool to see who is calling when you need to have your phone charging and it is not in plain sight.
